revision.text:
{{Actor| | type = Explosive | name = Beak puff | class = BeakPuff | game = Heretic }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:StaffPuff|StaffPuff]]→BeakPuff
The puff spawned when the {{Class|HereticPlayer|Heretic player}} hits something with his {{Class|beak}} while transformed into a {{Class|ChickenPlayer|chicken}}. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR BeakPuff : {{Class|StaffPuff}} { {{Property|Mass}} 5 {{Property|RenderStyle}} Translucent {{Property|Alpha}} 0.4 {{Property|AttackSound}} "chicken/attack" {{Property|VSpeed}} 1 }
